alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fayette, north central Coweta and south central Fulton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Palmetto, or 10 miles northwest of Fayetteville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Sandy Creek and Cannongate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
